column4: Hey guys, i've installed ubuntu via wubi to run dual boot alongside a windows install...  and i'm trying to access my files from my ubuntu install via windows. I've downloaded both Explore2fs and driver-fs but I don't seem to have an EXT2 file anywhere? Any help would be appreciated!
Please read the wubi faq and consider a real ext3 partition install
I've read it and it makes NO sense! It's 2 lines that say 'use driver-fs or explore2fs'
I wont use wubi or recommend it to anyone.
